import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Section2.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Review=["images/Reviews/Review1.jpg","images/Reviews/Review2.jpg","images/Reviews/Review3.jpg","images/Reviews/Review4.jpg","images/Reviews/Review5.jpg","images/Reviews/Review6.jpg","images/Reviews/Review7.jpg","images/Reviews/Review8.jpg"];function Section2(){const[first,setFirst]=useState(Math.floor(Math.random()*(7-0+1))+0);const[second,setSecond]=useState(Math.floor(Math.random()*(7-0+1))+0);const[third,setThird]=useState(Math.floor(Math.random()*(7-0+1))+0);const[selection,setSelection]=useState(Math.floor(Math.random()*(3-1+1))+1);useEffect(()=>{const intervalId=setInterval(()=>{var randDisplay=Math.floor(Math.random()*(7-0+1))+0;setSelection(Math.floor(Math.random()*(3-1+1))+1);switch(selection){case 1:moveOut();setTimeout(function(){setFirst(randDisplay);},500);setTimeout(function(){moveIn();},1000);break;case 2:moveOut();setTimeout(function(){setSecond(randDisplay);},500);setTimeout(function(){moveIn();},1000);break;case 3:moveOut();setTimeout(function(){setThird(randDisplay);},500);setTimeout(function(){moveIn();},1000);break;}},7000);return()=>{// Clean up the interval when the component unmounts
